---
title: Integrating Third Party Services with Apito
sidebar_label: Prerequisite
---


Apito is very extensible. You can extend apito if you need to **connect to any third-party api.** It is very easy.

:::note
The Third party app that you are trying to integrate with apito, must have an API or SDK that you can use.
:::

## Prerequisite

1. AWS Lambda Account
2. Apito Lambda Extension Configuration
